      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(String itemName,
                        Command command)
        Description copied from interface: EventPublisher
        Initiate synchronous sending of a command. This method does not return to the caller until all subscribers have processed the command.
        Specified by:
        sendCommand in interface EventPublisher
        Parameters:
        itemName - name of the item to send the command for
        command - the command to send

      • postCommand

        public void postCommand(String itemName,

        Description copied from interface: EventPublisher
